summary: Implemented a configurable Cash App payment URL and updated the Payments/Monetization section to use a Cash App-first flow with clear “Boostly links out; Cash App processes payments” copy, including disabling the CTA and showing a setup message when not configured. Evidence for the requested FAQ update is not present in the provided diff excerpt.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update the existing payments FAQ entry to reflect the Cash App-only payment flow and to explicitly state that Boostly does not process payments and that payments are completed on Cash App.
missing_requirements.reason: Although `frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts` is shown as modified, the provided truncated content does not include any FAQ entry changes related to payments, so the update cannot be verified from the diff summary.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/retained payment click tracking UI (showing “{cashAppClicks} clicks” badge) tied to `usePaymentClickCounts`, including recording clicks before opening the link.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest focuses on routing to a configurable Cash App destination and updating copy/CTA/FAQ; it does not request click analytics or click-count display in the Payments/Monetization UI.
